short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple measurement converter for cape feet and roods to meters and square meters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An app that converts cape feet to meters and millimeters as well as square roods to meters. This is a simple converter app that will be updated in the near future.
